definition: to bear the brunt
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
powerful/vigorous/pungent/towards/in view of
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash

sentences.english: It appears that in the face of chemical or biological warfare, a woman's primary job is to doff her clothes.
sentences.chinese: 若爆發生化戰爭，女人首當其衝要做的就是脫掉衣服。

sentences.english: Low self-esteem has become the number-one issue plaguing women.
sentences.chinese: 較低的自尊是折磨女性首當其衝的因素。

sentences.english: This unit always bears the brunt of any danger.
sentences.chinese: 出現險情時，這支部隊總是首當其衝。

sentences.english: Disappointed pirates continued to sail together and harass throughout Carolinas .
sentences.chinese: 失望的海盜船繼續騷擾，並在整個首當其衝。

sentences.english: As a result, the laid-off workers have to bear the brunt of the negative impact of market behavior.
sentences.chinese: 結果住房的市場行爲首當其衝的是下崗人員。

sentences.english: Among the four pollutions, fake report comes first.
sentences.chinese: 在新聞的“四大公害”中，首當其衝的是虛假新聞。

sentences.english: To change this situation, the most important move is to re-establish investors' confidence.
sentences.chinese: 要改變現狀，首當其衝的是重拾投資者的信心。

sentences.english: Bear the brunt of the financial system in Europe, the European Union country on its guard.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲的金融系統首當其衝，歐盟國家如臨大敵。

sentences.english: The fair was rich and colorful in content, of which trading was the most important.
sentences.chinese: 趕場的內容可謂豐富多彩，生意買賣自然首當其衝。

sentences.english: Forgiveness stands first of all other natural remedies.
sentences.chinese: 在所有自然療法中，原諒首當其衝。

sentences.english: The fisrt and foremost one is no basis in reality, such as net love.
sentences.chinese: 首當其衝的是缺少現實基礎，譬如網戀。

sentences.english: Indian troops bore the brunt of the Burma campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 在緬甸戰役中，印軍首當其衝。

sentences.english: Base metals in particular have borne the brunt of investors de-risking portfolios.
sentences.chinese: 在投資者消除資產風險時，賤金屬首當其衝。

sentences.english: In the Enviromental systems effected by climate change, cryosphere is on the first place.
sentences.chinese: 在氣候變化影響的諸環境系統中，冰凍圈首當其衝。

sentences.english: And who will bear the brunt of these cuts?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，哪些人將成爲首當其衝的受害者？

sentences.english: The first is the house rent! effectively as the second is the cat food.
sentences.chinese: 首當其衝的是房租，其次就是貓糧。
